Hi Heath

Happy new year!

We need to update the menu for Valentine's day, some of the dishes are removed and some description is updated as well as some prices.

Entrée

Replaces king Fish Cheveche

Kingfish carpaccio $38

Served with extra virgin olive oil lime, chilli, lemon dressing, pomegranate & raspberry

Description for the Blue Mountain figs changes to

fresh black figs wrapped with San Daniele prosciutto, served warm with sage & gorgonzola sauce

Add

Burrata $32

Seasonal trio tomato salad topped with a shell of mozzarella wrapped around a lush mixture of cheese curds served with crostini

Remove

Prawns and Zucchini flowers and caprese

Mains

Change description for Filleto di Manzo and price $70

120-day Black Angus grain fed hormone free Grilled fillet steak from Kilcoy Valley (QLD). Served with herb roasted potatoes in duck fat and seasonal greens

Desserts

Remove Tiramisu

Kind Regards

Rosanna
